attributes.action: Stop the closure of Ely Play Centre!
attributes.additional_details: This petition is in favour of Cardiff Council funding Children's Play Services.  Children's Play Services provides staffed 'Open Acces' play provision for children and young people aged 5-14 years old in the most deprived communities in Cardiff.  We the undersigned would like the Welsh Government to keep our Play Centre's open and not condemn the children to the dangerous streets of Cardiff.
